dialogue.text: *Most pages are water damaged beyond restoration.<wait=0.5> Diary owner's name is smeared across by ink*
*Some of the last pages is still readable*
Dear diary,<wait=0.2> you have been with me for so long,<wait=0.2> but sadly it is time to part away
I have found a new life beyond the mountains that split my home from <wait=0.5><speed=0.6>who I truly love</speed>
Life until now has caused me<wait=0.5> <speed=0.6>so much pain</speed>
I can not fully be free until everything reminding me of my childhood is gone
<speed=0.5>So this</speed><speed=0.8> is my goodbye to you</speed>
*Image of a child lying on its stomach and writing in what looks like a diary*
*The drawing:<wait=0.5> chaotic lines representing the surroundings,*
*a rusty bench outside which the child lies on with debris scattered across the ground*
*The background consists of sandy mountains drawn with fine lines.<wait=0.5> Tiny houses scattered across the peaks emitting smoke*
*A tiny person around the same age peeks out the window of one of the many houses,<wait=0.2> gazing across the horizon*
*This house,<wait=0.2> in particular,<wait=0.2> is drawn in greater detail than the others*
<speed=1.2>*Fiona can no longer contain her tears*</speed>
